## Run rate chart
```{r}
RR <- list(
  sa = c(4,6,9,1,11,10,11,4,17,11,15,12,17,6,10,8,5,7,3,20),
  ind = c(5,8,10,3,3,2,11,5,4,6,11,7,6,5,2,13,1,3,6,0)
)

plot_ly() %>%
  add_trace(
    x = seq_along(RR$sa),
    y = RR$sa,
    type = "scatter",
    mode = "lines+markers",
    name = "South Africa"
  ) %>%
  add_trace(
    x = seq_along(RR$ind),
    y = RR$ind,
    type = "scatter",
    mode = "lines+markers",
    name = "India"
  ) %>%
  layout(
    title = "Run Rate Comparison",
    xaxis = list(title ="Overs"),
    yaxis = list(title ="Run Rate")
  )
```
